---
name: Default issue template
about: Gives the basic instructions when creating an issue
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Please submit requests for additional functionality after reading the [Contributing](https://github.com/open-afc-project/openafc?tab=readme-ov-file#contributing) section of the Readme.

If you are looking for assistance setting up the software on your system please do *not* file an issue.  Please look at the [Q&A discussion](https://github.com/open-afc-project/openafc/discussions/categories/q-a) and post a question there.  Note that support on the forum may be limited in scope.
